dct_description_sm:
Italian edition. The cartouche illustrates a youth spearing a crocodile, another person
        riding a horse, nearby an elephant and a ostrich. An accurate geographical outline of the
        continent.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Dr. Oscar I. Norwich collection of maps of Africa and its islands, 1486 - ca. 1865 courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: This work has been identified as being free of known restrictions under copyright law, including all related and neighboring rights. You can copy, modify, distribute and perform the work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.
